snippet: In its latest amended prospectus, the last expected before the offering’s pricing, Carlyle said that it was selling 10 percent of its shares, giving it a value of up to $7.6 billion.
abstract: In its latest amended prospectus, the last expected before the offering’s pricing, Carlyle said that it was selling 10 percent of its shares, giving it a value of up to $7.6 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Tries to Avoid Troubles of Other I.P.O.s
headline.print_headline: Carlyle Cautious on I.P.O. After Others Had Missteps
